snippet.title: New Scrappers Update! Out now!
snippet.description:
Our first major update for the trash-catchin' co-op action game Scrappers is out now on Apple Arcade and comes with a host of awesome new Features! Play solo and be joined by S.C.R.A.P, the helpful AI buddy who helps you gather, stack and trash the garbage, just like a co-op partner should!

Become faster, stronger and more nimble with the reworked Overclock system in the for of Overclock bot, a floaty droid ready to boost you to new trashy heights!

And now, with the inclusion of a Party Code System, joining up with friends or random players has never been easier!
Check out the game on Apple Arcade at https://apple.co/3kuwa5p
